lead_paragraph: American Shelby Rogers defeated 2012 Wimbledon finalist Eugenie Bouchard of Canada 6-2, 2-6, 6-1 on a steamy opening day of play at the Brisbane International on Sunday.
snippet: American Shelby Rogers defeated 2012 Wimbledon finalist Eugenie Bouchard of Canada 6-2, 2-6, 6-1 on a steamy opening day of play at the Brisbane International on Sunday....

headline.main: Rogers Beats Bouchard in Brisbane International's 1st Round
headline.print_headline: Rogers Beats Bouchard in Brisbane International's 1st Round
